snippet.title: Panzer Dragoon: Remake Nintendo Switch release trailer
snippet.description:
Panzer Dragoon: Remake is a new, remade version of the Panzer Dragoon game true to the original, with improved graphics and controls, that suit modern gaming standards!

On a far, lone planet, you encounter two dragons awaken from the ancient times. Armed with a deadly gun from the past, and the guidance of your armored blue dragon, you must fulfill your destiny and keep the Prototype Dragon from reaching the Tower or die trying.

Watch live at https://www.twitch.tv/megavisionsmag

Mega Visions Magazine is the world's only physical SEGA-focused magazine. Preview the magazine and support the physical release on:  https://www.patreon.com/megavisions

For more information on Mega Visions Magazine, check out: http://www.megavisionsmag.com/

Follow us:
Twitter - https://twitter.com/megavisionsmag
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/megavisions/
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/megavisions...
